name: Pluggr
tag_list: plug, hot-topics, voiced, entertainment, entrepreneurship, technology, sports, video, interest
overview:
Pluggr - A real place to plug-in with people on the topics of your interest.

If you could only say one thing every 24 hours, would it be newsworthy? Pluggr is the place to give everyone a chance at being heard, whether you are a new startup, an artist, a large company, or someone who has something noteworthy or new to share.

Find the most interesting and talked about people, plugged into Technology, Entrepreneurship, Entertainment, Startups, and more!

More information can be found on our FAQ Page: http://www.pluggr.com/faq
